mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_num, order_date, image, id, pro_num, pro_info, pro_count, price, order_sum, coup_num, order_status) values(#{order_num}, sysdate, #{image}, #{id}, #{pro_num}, #{pro_info}, #{pro_count}, #{price}, #{order_sum}, #{coup_num}, 'WP')
mapper.update: update orders set pro_count = #{pro_count}, order_sum=#{order_sum}, order_result = #{order_result}, order_status=#{order_status} where order_num = #{order_num}
mapper.select: select count(order_num) from orders where id = #{id} and order_status not in('OC','OR','OX') order by order_num desc
select count(order_num) from orders where id = #{id} and order_status and order_date between #{order_date} and sysdate order by order_num desc

select * from (select O.*, rownum R from (select * from orders where id=#{order.id} and order_status and order_date between #{order.order_date} and sysdate order by order_num desc) O) where r between #{pager.startRow} and #{pager.lastRow}
select count(order_num) from orders where id=#{id} and order_status in('OC','OR','OX') and order_date between #{order_date} and sysdate order by order_num desc

select * from (select O.*, rownum R from (select * from orders where id=#{order.id} and order_status in('OC','OR','OX') and order_date between #{order.order_date} and sysdate order by order_num desc) O) where r between #{pager.startRow} and #{pager.lastRow}
